rules_text:
Compete [i](At the end of each of combat, you get a score counter for each opponent you attacked this turn. Spend six score counters as a sorcery to create Trophy tokens.)[/i]
When this enchantment enters, exile up to one target nonland permanent until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.
flavor_text: [i]Not all contestants who sign up are fit to compete... Some are desperate.[/i]
